p: Whole cell lysates of MDCK cells were prepared by homogenization in RIPA buffer. The whole cell lysate of MDCK cells was subjected to sodium dodecyl sulfate-polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis and 5-LOX and actin were analyzed by immunoblotting using an anti-5-LOX monoclonal antibody (ab169755, dilution 1/1,000; Abcam, Cambridge, UK) and anti-actin antibody (MAB1501R, dilution 1/2,000; Chemicon International, Temecula, CA).
